ygData.subject: QuotaEnforcer not working properly ?!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I am using QuotaEnforcer (max documents per host) and I am limiting the max document size. I think this combination isn t working in heritrix 1.6.0:

From: Thimo Eichstaedt <abc@...>
Subject: QuotaEnforcer not working properly ?!
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=251683900

Hello,

I am using QuotaEnforcer (max documents per host) and I am limiting 
the max document size.

I think this combination isn't working in heritrix 1.6.0:
QuotaEnforcer only counts the successfull fetches (and only 
interpretes 200 as successful), but in my crawls many server return 
status code 206, because heritrix is sending a partial content 
request when limiting the document size. So the number of documents 
often exceeds the quota settings...

So, why the QuotaEnforcer only treats 200 responses as successful 
fetches and is there an option to get it working right ?

thanks
   Thimo
